talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomSavaaq>Sav'aaq!<sp:5:0:0> That's how you greet someone
during the day!<sp:5:0:0> Did you know that?
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But I'm sure as long as you behave
yourself, you won't run into any trouble.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomSavsaaba>Sav'saaba! That's how you greet someone
at night!<sp:5:0:0> Did you know that?
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Anyway! Since you're here already, you
absolutely need to try <clr:0000>Romah's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff>!

And if you don't have enough to pay for it
right now, you can always try the spa plan
that <clr:0000>Olu<clr:ffff>, her apprentice, offers.
<sp:0:2:2:5000>But, well... Just keep in mind that it's discounted for
a reason. I don't think the results are guaranteed...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CustomSavotta>Sav'otta!<sp:5:0:0> That's how you greet someone
in the morning!<sp:5:0:0> You remember, right?
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's really rare for a voe to be able to
come and go in Gerudo Town, so make
the most of it! Sav'orq!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>The spa plan that <clr:0000>Olu<clr:ffff> offers is reasonably
priced and a good option too!

<sp:0:2:2:5000>But, well... Just keep in mind that it's discounted for
a reason. I don't think the results are guaranteed...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You must be that man—I mean voe—that
everyone is talking about! It's so unusual
to see a man here...
So you really did get special permission
to be in here, huh?

<sp:3:0:2:0400>All the same, you should still be on your
best behavior.

You wouldn't want to end up thrown out
or in jail. That's what normally happens
when men come here.
talk0017:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0800>Olu<clr:ffff> is apprenticing under <clr:0000>Romah<clr:ffff>.


She's the only vai who has ever had
the opportunity to inherit Romah's
special technique.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But...she's still learning. The effects of
her spa plan are a bit less reliable, you
might say.
The price is more affordable though!
If you're in the mood to take a chance,
you should give it a shot!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You must be that man—I mean voe—that
everyone is talking about! It's so unusual
to see a man here...
talk0008: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Like what happened to that guy over there...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you tried either of the spa plans?


<clr:0000>Romah<clr:ffff>'s speaks for itself, but <clr:0000>Olu<clr:ffff>'s is
worth checking out too, if you're a bit
light on rupees. You can't go wrong!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But I don't think you have anything to
worry about as long as you behave.
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Anyway, this is important! Since you've
been allowed in town, you absolutely have
to try the <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff> at Hotel Oasis!
The owner of the place, <clr:0000>Romah<clr:ffff>, has a
special technique that is all the rage.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Originally I was just another customer
coming here to relax, but I got hooked...

Now I work here as an assistant, ha!
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomSavaaq>Sav'aaq!<sp:5:0:0> That's how you greet someone
during the day!<sp:5:0:0> You remember, right?
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The owner of Hotel Oasis, <clr:0000>Romah<clr:ffff>, is
known by vai the world over!

Her special relaxation technique can not
only improve the condition of your skin...

but it is known to <clr:0000>awaken dormant powers<clr:ffff>
inside you for a time, as well!

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Originally I was just another customer
coming here to relax, but I got hooked...

Now I work here as an assistant, ha!


<clr:0000>Olu<clr:ffff>'s spa plan is pretty good too, but
in the end...<clr:0000>Romah<clr:ffff>'s is by far the more
popular one!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomSavsaaba>Sav'saaba! That's how you greet someone
at night!<sp:5:0:0> You remember, right?
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's really rare for a voe to be able to
come and go in Gerudo Town.

You should absolutely check out Romah's
spa plan—you won't be able to find
anything like it anywhere else!
Try it! Try it!
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're back!


It's always kind of exciting to see you,
what with men not really allowed to come
into Gerudo Town!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Of course, you should be careful not to
cause any problems...<sp:5:1:0>
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CustomSavotta>Sav'otta!<sp:5:0:0> That's how you greet someone
in the morning!<sp:5:0:0> Did you know that?
talk0026: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Otherwise, you might end up like that guy...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
